paragraphs_and_tables.text: Business Context

As per the CIBC process, it is utmost important to update its new mortgagor’s about CIBC’s dedications in providing high standard of client service and protecting all of the information provided by the customer. CIBC provides these information by mailing them two brochures, entitled Our Service Commitment and Your Privacy is Protected along with the covering letter.
